page.title: 07Employment.
page.content: Some of the people in the village work on the oil rig that is situated at Kishorn.They have to leave very early in the morning, because it takes one hour to get to Kishorn. Some people in Kyleakin work on the ferry that runs from Kyleakin to Kyle. Quite a few people fish for haddock and herring out behind the Lighthouse.Their are just a few people that are self-employed.Their is some people that work for British Telecom, they usually go up poles to mend wires, or mend cables under the ground. There are quite a lot of people that work in hotels, as waitresses, waiters and cooks.
